name: multifamily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving or designed for more than one family: There are plans to develop the land for more multifamily housing. Multi-family rental properties are a critical source of housing for more than four in ten New Yorkers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe authority focused largely on developing affordable multifamily housing.Regulations state that smoke detectors must be installed in all multi-family dwellings.The developer has approvals for 1,000 single-family units, 876 multifamily units, a business park and a hotel.
